{{lowercase}} {{ infobox software | name = gnome-screenshot | screenshot = [[Image:Gnome-screenshot on Ubuntu.png|175px]] | caption = The gnome-screenshot dialogue on [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] | developer = GNOME | operating_system = [[Unix-like]] | platform = [[GNOME]] | latest_release_version = 2.26.0 | latest_release_date = 16 March 2009 | latest_preview_version = 2.27.2 | latest_preview_date = 15 June 2009 }}
'''gnome-screenshot''' is a utility used in the [[GNOME]] [[Desktop Environment]] for taking [[screenshot]]s. It is a part of the GNOME Utilities package.
It provides several options, including capturing the whole desktop or just a single window, a time delay function, and some image effects.
Similar applications include Shutter, which provides more options, and [[KSnapshot]] in [[KDE]].
== External links ==
* [http://git.gnome.org/browse/gnome-utils/tree/gnome-screenshot gnome-screenshot in GNOME GIT] * [http://live.gnome.org/GnomeUtils GNOME Utilities on live.gnome.org] {{GNOME Software}}
